page.title: 15Insch pupils visit Academy.
page.content: On Wednesday the 5th of June at about 7.05 I was up and getting ready to pay a Familiarisation Visit to Inverurie Academy.As I ate my breakfast I wond_ ered what kind of things we would have to do.I left the house at 8.00 and went down to the bus stop in the Square where I met three of my class_ mates.As the bus arrived at 8.10.I felt quite nervous. When we arrived at the Academy we went into the dining hall,where our bus fares were refunded.We bought our dinner tickets and we were told which classes we were in. Two Prefects took us to our first class, English.The teacher was Mrs. Still, and she explained about our course.After that we visited the Science Department,where we completed interesting Chemistry and Physics experiments.
